In this document we calculate the mean of a column from a dataset in R and plot sepal length vs sepal width in Python.

```{r}
mean(mtcars$mpg)
```

```{python}
from sklearn.datasets import load_iris
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
iris = load_iris(as_frame=True)
plt.scatter(iris.data["sepal length (cm)"],iris.data["sepal width (cm)"])
plt.xlabel("sepal length (cm)")
plt.ylabel("sepal width (cm)")
plt.show()
```
